metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8566 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The mod_auth_mellon module before 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via unspecified vectors related to a "session overflow" involving "sessions overlapping in memory."

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-mellon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
